pages.text: To get started I recommend you have a look for $(thing)Create$() in your $(thing)advancements tab$(). $(br2)Want references and examples? Click the goggles icon in the pause menu! From there you can acess the ponder index. $(br2)Alternatively:$(br)$(c:/create ponder)Click here to ponder
Stuck and not sure how something works? $(br2)The Create wiki has great information regarding the ins and outs of engineering.
